title: @Meddler Will Armor Pen Runes/Masteries Change to Lethality R/M?
body: Mostly just title, I was wondering if they would stay and have their current function similar to when Spell Vamp was removed but runes and masteries for it remained, or if they will transition to Lethality?

replies.body: Armor pen in runes and masteries will be changing to Lethality yes.

So what happens to the physical damage junglers that relied on armor pen runes. And you can't simply give the excuse to buy new runes since they are costly for many players. Either the lethality of runes will have to be significantly buffed or the early armor of jungle creeps will have to be nerfed.
We'll be tuning both individual champs and jungle camps as needed to account for larger systemic changes like this.

Thats good to hear. Similar related note on junglers effected by the mastery change why not give warelords spellvamp also andthe ability to work on jungle monsters also or even look at doing a full keystone pass in a way that it can be effective on junglers also. Fervor, grasp, and DFG could be modified to work in the jungle but with reduced effectiveness against monsters. I think this could be the best change that would be a benefit to all the junglers without needing to tune anything else from the changes to smite buff removal + APen change + SoTA removal

On a non related note, I hope the team considers more ways to make sure you have a proper difference on more AD  vs more APen/lethality idea in a similar way that you are doing with the updated duskblade by giving unique effects scaling off of lethality.
Does lethality have an effect on minions and monsters?  They have levels too, right?  How will it compare with current armour penetration vs them?
Any plan for the real armor pen (mean against tank) ?
Hybrid pen runes too? What about mpen?
They're absolute trash if they do unless they're buffed considerably to compensate.
